title: (x) Brandon Sheremata script and sans - Shelley Script, Helvetica {Yves}
content:
Have a student who needs this font identified and haven't the time to help him. Can anyone help please?! (thank you!)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023643/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_1.png) | 10.52 KB |
author: andi emery

comments.content: The sans is [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023643/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.107997.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Graphic+Designer&sampleSize=24), but I should look up the script, unless somebody else knows it right away.
